column2:
"Is this the dragon soul
mist that was observed?...
It's a somewhat techal sight."
"The rainbow mist is not possible with normal weather. This strange data is different from that of abnormal weather."

"Okay, right then. It looks like there
is a clear will for life inside the mist..."

"...wait, what am I saying?...
I've got to analyze this phenomenon right away."

"Anyhow, you've
completed my request with this!
Thank you so very much!"
